pullrequest.title: [Citadel] Fuel resource metadata, which can be used instead of 'model.config'

content.raw:
Do we expect any other libraries to use this function besides `ign-fuel_tools`? If not, I'd suggest we move these conversion functions there, for 2 reasons:

* avoid adding the TinyXML dependency to `ign-msgs`
* The less places we have handling  `model.config`, the easier it should be to eventually deprecate its use
content.html:
Do we expect any other libraries to use this function besides ign-fuel_tools? If not, I'd suggest we move these conversion functions there, for 2 reasons:

  • avoid adding the TinyXML dependency to ign-msgs
  • The less places we have handling model.config, the easier it should be to eventually deprecate its use
